languages.text: "Ни в коем случае, Ваша Светлость. Сейчас в столице около сотни Арбитес, и все они защищают Администратум. Благодаря их боевому мастерству и отваге, сейчас это одно из немногих мест улья, что оказалось не по зубам ксеносам".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Ни в коем случае, Ваша Светлость. Их мало, и сейчас штаб бросил все силы на защиту Администратума. Благодаря их профессионализму и отваге, на данный момент это один из немногих секторов планеты, что оказались не по зубам ксеносам".
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Not at all, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There are approximately one hundred Arbites in the capital right now, and they are all defending the Administratum. Thanks to their bravery and fighting prowess, it is one of the few places in the hive that the xenos have failed to overrun."
languages.original_text: "Ни в коем случае, Ваша Светлость. Сейчас в столице около сотни Арбитес, и все они защищают Администратум. Благодаря их боевому мастерству и отваге, сейчас это одно из немногих мест улья, что оказалось не по зубам ксеносам".

traits.locale_text: "Not at all, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There are approximately one hundred Arbites in the capital right now, and they are all defending the Administratum. Thanks to their bravery and fighting prowess, it is one of the few places in the hive that the xenos have failed to capture."

"Not at all, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There are approximately one hundred Arbites in the capital right now, and they are all defending the Administratum. Thanks to their bravery and fighting prowess, it is one of the few places in the hive that the xenos have failed to capture."

"Not at all, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There are approximately one hundred Arbites in the capital right now, and they are all defending the Administratum. Thanks to their bravery and fighting prowess, it is one of the few places in the hive that the xenos have failed to capture."

"Not at all, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There are approximately one hundred Arbites in the capital right now, and they are all defending the Administratum. Thanks to their bravery and fighting prowess, it is one of the few places in the hive that the xenos have failed to overrun."

"Not at all, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There are approximately one hundred Arbites in the capital right now, and they are all defending the Administratum. Thanks to their bravery and fighting prowess, it is one of the few places in the hive that the xenos have failed to overrun."

languages.text: "Ganz und gar nicht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! In der Hauptstadt halten sich derzeit etwa hundert Arbites auf, die alle das Administratum verteidigen. Dank ihrer Tapferkeit und ihrer Kampfkraft ist es einer der wenigen Orte der Makropole, die von den Xenos nicht überrannt wurden."
languages.original_text: "Not at all, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There are approximately one hundred Arbites in the capital right now, and they are all defending the Administratum. Thanks to their bravery and fighting prowess, it is one of the few places in the hive that the xenos have failed to overrun."

traits.locale_text: "Ganz und gar nicht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! In der Hauptstadt halten sich derzeit etwa hundert Arbites auf, die alle das Administratum verteidigen. Dank ihrer Tapferkeit und ihrer Kampfkraft ist es einer der wenigen Orte der Makropole, die von den Xenos nicht überrannt wurden."

languages.text: « Non, Votre Seigneurie. Il y a environ cent membres de l'Arbites dans la capitale en ce moment même et ils sont tous en train de défendre l'Administratum. Grâce à leur courage et à leurs prouesses au combat, c'est l'un des rares endroits de la ruche que les xénos n'ont pas réussi à envahir. »
languages.original_text: "Not at all, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There are approximately one hundred Arbites in the capital right now, and they are all defending the Administratum. Thanks to their bravery and fighting prowess, it is one of the few places in the hive that the xenos have failed to overrun."

traits.locale_text: « Non, Votre Seigneurie. Il y a environ cent membres de l'Arbites dans la capitale en ce moment même et ils sont tous en train de défendre l'Administratum. Grâce à leur courage et à leurs prouesses au combat, c'est l'un des rares endroits de la ruche que les xénos n'ont pas réussi à envahir. »

languages.text: “绝非如此，大人。目前，首都大约驻扎着一百名法务官，所有人都在全力防守内政部。幸亏有了这些勇猛的战士，内政部目前尚未沦陷，是整个巢都为数不多的安全区域之一。”
languages.original_text: "Not at all, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There are approximately one hundred Arbites in the capital right now, and they are all defending the Administratum. Thanks to their bravery and fighting prowess, it is one of the few places in the hive that the xenos have failed to overrun."

traits.locale_text: “绝非如此，大人。目前，首都大约驻扎着一百名法务官，所有人都在全力防守内政部。幸亏有了这些勇猛的战士，内政部目前尚未沦陷，是整个巢都为数不多的安全区域之一。”

languages.text: «En absoluto, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Hay aproximadamente un centenar de Arbitrator en la capital en estos momentos, todos ellos defendiendo el Administratum. Gracias a su valor y capacidad de combate, es uno de los pocos lugares de la colmena que los xenos no han conseguido asolar».
languages.original_text: "Not at all, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There are approximately one hundred Arbites in the capital right now, and they are all defending the Administratum. Thanks to their bravery and fighting prowess, it is one of the few places in the hive that the xenos have failed to overrun."

traits.locale_text: «En absoluto, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Hay aproximadamente un centenar de Arbitrator en la capital en estos momentos, todos ellos defendiendo el Administratum. Gracias a su valor y capacidad de combate, es uno de los pocos lugares de la colmena que los xenos no han conseguido asolar».

languages.text: 「とんでもありません、陛下。現在、首都にはおよそ100名のアービトレイターがおり、彼らは全員、帝国行政局の防衛にあたっております。彼らの勇敢さと戦闘力のおかげで、そこはハイヴでも数少ない、異種族が制圧できなかった場所の一つとなっております」
languages.original_text: "Not at all, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There are approximately one hundred Arbites in the capital right now, and they are all defending the Administratum. Thanks to their bravery and fighting prowess, it is one of the few places in the hive that the xenos have failed to overrun."

traits.locale_text: 「とんでもありません、陛下。現在、首都にはおよそ100名のアービトレイターがおり、彼らは全員、帝国行政局の防衛にあたっております。彼らの勇敢さと戦闘力のおかげで、そこはハイヴでも数少ない、異種族が制圧できなかった場所の一つとなっております」

languages.text: "Hiç de bile {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Şu anda başkentte yüz kadar Arbites mensubu bulunuyor. Hepsi de Administratum'u savunuyor. Cesaretleri ve çatışma becerileri sayesinde Administratum, zenoların kovanda ele geçiremediği ender yerlerden biri olarak kaldı."
languages.original_text: "Not at all, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There are approximately one hundred Arbites in the capital right now, and they are all defending the Administratum. Thanks to their bravery and fighting prowess, it is one of the few places in the hive that the xenos have failed to overrun."

traits.locale_text: "Hiç de bile {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Şu anda başkentte yüz kadar Arbites mensubu bulunuyor. Hepsi de Administratum'u savunuyor. Cesaretleri ve çatışma becerileri sayesinde Administratum, zenoların kovanda ele geçiremediği ender yerlerden biri olarak kaldı."
